css: .tutorial-container{pointer-events: none;position: fixed;z-index: 100;top: 0;left: 0;width: 100vw;height: 100vh;}.tutorial-content{position: relative;width: 100%;height: 100%;}.tutorial-button{pointer-events: all;position: fixed;right: 2%;bottom: 2%;z-index: 1;background-color: red;width: 40px;height: 40px;}.btn-group{width:100%}.btn-group button {background-color: #04AA6D;border: 1px solid green;color: white;padding: 10px 24px;cursor: pointer;width: 100%;display: block;}.btn-group button:not(:last-child) {border-bottom: none;}.btn-group button:hover {background-color: #3e8e41;}.tutorial-topics-container{position:absolute;top:50%;left:50%;transform: translate(-50%, -50%);width:30%; background-color: chocolate;padding: 1rem; pointer-events: all;}.tutorial-step-highlight{background-color: red;!important}
